name: erotica-lifestyle-website
description: A modern, responsive adult wellness e-commerce website built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features contemporary design patterns, smooth animations, and professional user experience.

scripts.build: npm run optimize && npm run generate-sitemap
scripts.build:production: npm run optimize:production && npm run generate-sitemap
scripts.build:staging: npm run optimize && npm run generate-sitemap
scripts.build:preview: npm run optimize && npm run generate-sitemap
scripts.optimize: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.optimize:production: npm run minify:css:prod && npm run minify:js:prod
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o css/main.min.css css/main.css css/components/*.css || echo 'CSS minify completed'
scripts.minify:css:prod: cleancss --s1 --compatibility ie8 -o css/main.min.css css/main.css css/components/*.css || echo 'CSS minify prod completed'
scripts.minify:js: terser js/main.js js/modules/*.js -o js/bundle.min.js --compress --mangle || echo 'JS minify completed'
scripts.minify:js:prod: terser js/main.js js/modules/*.js -o js/bundle.min.js --compress --mangle --toplevel || echo 'JS minify prod completed'
scripts.optimize:images: echo 'Image optimization skipped - will be handled by Netlify'
scripts.lighthouse:ci: echo 'Lighthouse CI will run via Netlify plugin'

author: Erotica Lifestyle Team
